objectives: Students will analyze and evaluate different perspectives on artificial intelligence and technology
Students will articulate complex ideas with supporting arguments
Students will demonstrate spontaneous interaction with minimal hesitation
Students will use advanced discourse markers to structure their speech
can_do_statements: Understand main ideas of complex text on concrete and abstract topics
Interact with degree of fluency and spontaneity with native speakers

warm_up.description: Students brainstorm ideas related to artificial intelligence and technology and categorize them
instructions: Write the topic on the board
Students call out related words and concepts

main_activities.title: Debate: Artificial Intelligence and Technology
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

main_activities.title: Case study analysis: Artificial Intelligence and Technology
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

main_activities.title: Presentation and Q&A: Artificial Intelligence and Technology
procedure: Introduce the activity and model if necessary
Divide students into pairs or small groups
Monitor and provide support as needed

discussion_questions: To what extent do you agree that artificial intelligence and technology is important?
What are the main challenges associated with artificial intelligence and technology?
How might artificial intelligence and technology evolve in the next decade?
What factors influence people's attitudes toward artificial intelligence and technology?
In what ways does artificial intelligence and technology affect society?
What measures could be taken to improve artificial intelligence and technology?
How does artificial intelligence and technology differ across cultures?
What role does government play in artificial intelligence and technology?
What are the ethical implications of artificial intelligence and technology?
How can individuals contribute to artificial intelligence and technology?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Debate about artificial intelligence and technology
Professional meeting about artificial intelligence and technology

practice_activities: Identifying weak forms in authentic speech
Rhythm and stress in longer utterances

extension_activities: Research current trends in artificial intelligence and technology and present findings
Write an argumentative essay about artificial intelligence and technology
Create a podcast episode discussing artificial intelligence and technology

homework.task: Write a 250-word opinion piece on artificial intelligence and technology
requirements: Present a clear argument with supporting evidence
Use discourse markers to structure your writing

assessment_criteria.fluency: Can express ideas smoothly with few pauses
assessment_criteria.accuracy: Shows good grammatical control with few errors
assessment_criteria.vocabulary: Has good range of vocabulary with some precision
assessment_criteria.pronunciation: Clear and natural with good control
assessment_criteria.interaction: Can engage actively and maintain discourse

teacher_notes.preparation: Review key vocabulary and concepts related to artificial intelligence and technology
anticipated_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge on this topic
Students may need encouragement to speak at length
differentiation: Provide sentence starters for less confident students
Offer more complex discussion questions for advanced students
Allow use of dictionaries during preparation time
teacher_notes.cultural_considerations: Be aware of cultural sensitivities related to artificial intelligence and technology
teacher_notes.follow_up: Monitor student progress and provide individual feedback

methodology: Communicative Language Teaching (CLT) with Task-Based Learning
